name: Unforgiving 2
description:
Premise

Collect all 13 keys in the map to win. BUT BE CAUTIOUS! The weather is eerie, the clouds are wielding thunder. So make sure to be under shelter when it strikes.

This game is a jam submission to Ludum Dare 51.

Controls

ARROW-KEYS to move

SPACE to jump

Credits

Game by Morfy

Music by RetroIndieJosh

Contains music ©2021 Joshua McLean (https://joshua-mclean.itch.io) Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International
